english.segment1: Shrouded in proof, You're the mystery. You're the truth that lives within the world we see. You're the hand that holds destiny
english.segment2: And I can't pretend i don't know. And I can't leave it alone (yeah, yeah)
english.segment3: Chorus: You're the best kept secret in my generation. The best kept secret of all time. Youre the best kept secret in my generation. And I found you out
english.segment4: You're the hope over the centuries. You're the cosmic force that rules the galaxies. You're the evidence that demands our belief
english.segment5: And I can't live for myself. I can't keep this all to myself (yeah, yeah)
english.segment7: Let it out. Let it out. Let it out. Let it out, yeah!
english.segment8: And I can't pretend I don't know. And I can't leave it alone (yeah, yeah)
